page.title: 19HAPPY VALLEY, CULVERSTONE
page.content: In the south west corner of this area there is a very attractive forked valley running from the top of the North Downs to the Medway valley at Cuxton. Much of it was originally coppiced woodland and downland but has degenerated into scrub. In the l930's the land was sold in small lots and occupied under the planning designation of "Weekend and Holiday Chalet Area". Much difficulty was experienced by the local authority in trying to enforce these rules and the result has been indiscriminate development. In the l984/5 Local Plan the area comes under normal Green Belt Planning Rules, with no new dwellings allowed in the hope that in this way the area can be tidied up and made more acceptable generally.
